title: Citi Wins Multiple Debt Capital Markets Awards
summary: London – Citi has been recognized as an industry leader in debt capital markets through a series of accolades awarded by multiple industry publications. Citi was named:
tag-1: Citi Wins Multiple Debt Capital Markets Awards
tag-2: London – Citi has been recognized as an industry leader in debt capital markets through a series of accolades awarded by multiple industry publications. Citi was named:
tag-3: The awards were decided by specialist editorial panels based on pitching processes, feedback from industry participants as well as relevant market data and league tables.
tag-4: IFR judges praised a "stellar year for Citi" in all regions, highlighting the "impressive" number of deals on which Citi has acted as a global coordinator.
tag-5: Commenting on Citi's performance in the Medium Term Note (MTN) market, mtn-i noted: "Citi continues to display unmatched multi-regional strengths that enables the bank to remain market leaders in origination and distribution of non-public debt. Even as competition intensifies still further, Citi's reach and relevance remains exceptional."
tag-6: CMD highlighted that the top award had been attributed to Citi due to the bank's "strong league table performance across the board" combined with high scores "in a number of categories in CMDs' polls".
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
